cast: Cast : Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Elliot Page, Ken Watanabe
movie_description: Summary : A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.

directors: Director : Joaquim Dos Santos, Kemp Powers, Justin K. Thompson
cast: Cast : Shameik Moore, Hailee Steinfeld, Brian Tyree Henry, Luna Lauren Velez
movie_description: Summary : Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence. When the heroes clash on how to handle a new threat, Miles must redefine what it means to be a hero.

cast: Cast : Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Jessica Chastain, Mackenzie Foy
movie_description: Summary : When Earth becomes uninhabitable in the future, a farmer and ex-NASA pilot, Joseph Cooper, is tasked to pilot a spacecraft, along with a team of researchers, to find a new planet for humans.

cast: Cast : Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss, Hugo Weaving
movie_description: Summary : When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

movie_name: Title : Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
cast: Cast : Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
movie_description: Summary : After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

cast: Cast : Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Alec Guinness
movie_description: Summary : Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

cast: Cast : Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick
movie_description: Summary : A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son John from an even more advanced and powerful cyborg.

cast: Cast : Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt, Veronica Cartwright
movie_description: Summary : The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounters a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

cast: Cast : Christian Bale, Hugh Jackman, Scarlett Johansson, Michael Caine

movie_description: Summary : Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

cast: Cast : Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Hemsworth
movie_description: Summary : After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

cast: Cast : Sigourney Weaver, Michael Biehn, Carrie Henn, Paul Reiser
movie_description: Summary : Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

movie_description: Summary : Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

cast: Cast : Robert Downey Jr., Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Chris Evans
movie_description: Summary : The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

cast: Cast : Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight, Jeff Garlin, Fred Willard
movie_description: Summary : In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movie_description: Summary : When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.

movie_description: Summary : After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins: a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer HAL 9000.

movie_name: Title : Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
cast: Cast : Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher, Billy Dee Williams
movie_description: Summary : After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the second Death Star, while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

cast: Cast : Brigitte Helm, Alfred Abel, Gustav Fröhlich, Rudolf Klein-Rogge
